title.native: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。
title.romaji: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita.
title.english: The Weakest Tamer Began a Journey to Pick Up Trash

description:
Stars are everything, granting abilities to Tamers. So when Ivy was born without one, her village took it as an ill omen! Now banished, she leads a lonely life of salvaging rubbish to survive. That is until she befriends Sora, a weak little slime, in the forest. Together, the delicate duo embarks on a heartwarming journey of survival and discovers there’s more to Ivy than being starless.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: การผจญภัยของเทมเมอร์มือใหม่กับสไลม์สุดด๋อย
最弱魔物使開始了撿垃圾之旅。
Слабейшая укротительница отправляется в путешествие по сбору мусора

tags.name: Homeless
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Wilderness
tags.description: Predominantly features a location with little to no human activity, such as a deserted island, a jungle, or a snowy mountain range.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

title.native: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。
最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。@COMIC

node.description:
**Height:** 147 cm
**Hobbies:** Singing, drawing, watching anime

[Website](https://suzukiaina.jp/) | [Profile (IAM Agency)](http://iamagency.sukurepo.jp/actors/women/suzuki_aina) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aina_suzuki723) | [Agency Twitter](https://twitter.com/AinaSuzuki_Info) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpNypDVlaMyJDx7P8u3dd-A)

She debuted as a voice actress in 2014. She is also skilled in the Minyou (民謡) genre, which is a genre of traditional Japanese music, where she won many competitions.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Sakawa - Azur Lane (VG)

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/DublandoCoisas) | [Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/dublandocoisas) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/DublandoCoisas)

Lucas Almeida is a Brazilian actor, director and voice actor. He is married to [Mayara Stefane](https://anilist.co/staff/197179/).
**Liu Yunliu (劉雲留)** is a Chinese animator and animation director.
